name: Antarctic Dream
description:
Antarctic Dream is a free game developed by Agustín Toptschij (chaos98) for #BrownieJam # 1

BreakOut like game

  • 40 Levels
  • 4 Power ups

The art seen in the game was made by me.

Controls - 

  • Arrows: Aim and move
  • Z: Action bottom
  • Backspace: Main Menu
  • Left/right to choose in the level select

Special thanks to:

Denni (Voices)

Muumeii (Icon)

BEC (Tester)

I hope you like it, all comments are well received!

Dedicado a @MontyDrake quien me motivó a adentrarme en este hobby
